thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel with excellent location
thread.title_full: Great hotel with excellent location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jan S
title: Great hotel with excellent location
text: If you want to have walking distance to Empire State building (5 min), Grand Central station (5min), Chrysler building (10 min) and Times square (10 min) this is a great hotel! Just next to the hotel you have a subway station just next to the hotel. First we got a room facing the garden which was dark and no view. The stuff at the hotel was wery serviceminded and changed to a room at the 47th floor with a spectacular view. There is a gym at the hotel and a lot of nice breakfast restaurants nearby i.e Markets creates which serves delicious kinoa bowls.
